function.name: get_openstack_control_plane
function.description: Runs the openshift client (oc) to get the openstack control plane status

function.name: check_openstack_svc
function.description: Runs the openshift client (oc) to get the openstack control plane service status

service.description: The service to check. e.g. Glance

function.name: needs_minor_update
function.description: Check whether the openstack control plane is up to date or we need to perform a minor update

function.name: get_deployed_version
function.description: Returns which openstack version is deployed

function.name: get_available_version
function.description: Returns which openstack version is available, which is useful, in combination to get_deployed_version, to check whether we need to perform a minor update
